Name: Lost History
Description: Locate five lighthouses in Huanglong, collect information, and help the historian to uncover the truth
QuestDesc: Locate five lighthouses in Huanglong, collect information, and help the historian to uncover the truth

Conditions.PreQuestName: Repair the Lighthouse at the Wuming Bay
Repair the lighthouse in Desorock Highland

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, hello! You must be the one who solved the mysteries of the lighthouses.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, describe to me your findings within the consoles. I am truly intrigued.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You tell the historian about what you found inside the consoles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... I didn't expect such stories to have occurred.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What was the final destination of the "Stingray"? A question that would truly arouse one's interest... It feels that this would make a wonderful research topic.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Having studied the historical records, I have learned that there are five of these identical lighthouses within Jinzhou in total.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Obtaining the records from all of the lighthouses' consoles may just reveal the whereabouts of the "Stingray."

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can you ask you to find the records of the remaining lighthouses? I'll prepare gifts in return for your troubles!

Options.PlotLineKey: Not a problem, leave it to me.
Doesn't matter. I'm just here for the history part.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha. Then I shall entrust the task to you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, hello! You must be the one who solved the mysteries of the lighthouses.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, describe to me your findings within the consoles. I am truly intrigued.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You tell the historian what you found inside the consoles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How could this be?! You managed to find information from all five lighthouse consoles you say...!

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your passion for history is much greater than that of my own pupils. This brings tears to my eyes.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are we now able to find the location of the Stingray?

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, this information is more than adequate for me to calculate the Stingray's whereabouts. But there is something strange about this...

Options.PlotLineKey: What is it? You can't find it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No. It's just that it is not worth searching for it anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to those coordinates, I can say with confidence that this Stingray is the same ship that we salvaged near the harbor of the Whining Aix's Mire a few years prior.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Inside the wreckage, we found some of the crew's logs, although broken into pieces, we still managed to link them with the stories found in the consoles.

Options.PlotLineKey: So were Moak and his crew all safe?

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unfortunately, we also discovered six bodies inside... Based on the information we have, they belong to Moak and his crew members.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Further investigations found that the deaths of the other five members date back even further than the time when Moak made his first recording in the lighthouse.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In other words, Moak had been sailing on the sea alone all this time, and his crew members had long since fallen victim to the TDs...

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Experiencing such losses, Moak refused to accept such an ending. So he fell into a fantasy, that he and his crew members all found the lighthouses one by one, found their own homes, and left the Stingray safely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end, only he himself completed the voyage and forever laid in that seabed with the Stingray.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you sure this is what truly happened...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I cannot make any guarantees, as these are just my own speculations. Yet, unfolding forgotten stories, is what makes history fascinating.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Regardless, I'm really grateful for letting me see the whole story. Your passion for history truly deserves these rewards.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, Rover. Did you find the remaining lighthouses?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You tell the historian what you found inside the consoles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is that so? You managed to find information from all five lighthouse consoles you say...!

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your passion for history is much greater than that of my own pupils. This brings tears to my eyes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you sure this is what truly happened...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I cannot make any guarantees, as these are just my own speculations. Yet, unfolding forgotten stories, is what makes history fascinating.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Regardless, I'm really grateful for letting me see the whole story. Your passion for history truly deserves these rewards.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello Rover, do you still remember me? I'm a historian from the Imperial Academy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It appears you have activated all five lighthouses. I'm sure you must have learned a great deal about the Stingray.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, come back to the city and tell me all about them when you have the time to spare.

Dialogues.Speaker: Historian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe this time, we can finally solve this unknown piece of history!
